subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Big Brown (Race Horse)
organizations: New York State Racing and Wagering Board
lead_paragraph: The New York State Racing and Wagering Board revoked the license of the trainer Richard Dutrow Jr. and barred him from New York racetracks for at least 10 years.
snippet: The New York State Racing and Wagering Board revoked the license of the trainer Richard Dutrow Jr. and barred him from New York racetracks for at least 10 years.
